sys_script_include.name: XLSXAttachmentUtil

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_039897bc0760301037c7f2ae7c1ed0e2
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_93700_arena.XLSXAttachmentUtil</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>XLSXAttachmentUtil</name><script><![CDATA[var XLSXAttachmentUtil = Class.create();
XLSXAttachmentUtil.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	saveAsAttachment: function() {
		var content = this.getParameter('sysparm_content');
		
		var gr = new GlideRecord('incident');
		gr.get('55640fcc1b420010a3fbfc86cc4bcb8c');
		
		gs.addInfoMessage(gr.getDisplayValue());
		
// 		var decodedBytes = GlideStringUtil.base64DecodeAsBytes(content);
		
		var gsa = new GlideSysAttachment();
		var attachmentId = gsa.writeBase64(gr, 'Export.xlsx', 'application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet', content);
		
		gs.addInfoMessage(attachmentId);
		
		return attachmentId;
	},
    type: 'XLSXAttachmentUtil'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jaydeepdeb</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-06-02 19:45:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>039897bc0760301037c7f2ae7c1ed0e2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>XLSXAttachmentUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Arena" source="x_93700_arena">661460dfdbc5c010b6db8e47489619ae</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Arena">661460dfdbc5c010b6db8e47489619ae</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_039897bc0760301037c7f2ae7c1ed0e2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jaydeepdeb</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-06-02 19:48:04</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
